message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000. This is a great price considering the value it holds for you. Let's work together to make this deal happen.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a deal at this price.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I'm willing to negotiate, $900,000 is still a bit low for me.  I'm open to selling at $950,000. Let's meet in the middle and finalize this deal.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking $925,000 would be a fair price. Let's see if we can make a deal at this price.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $925,000 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $940,000. This is a fair price considering the value you'll get from this product. Let's close this deal.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking $935,000 would be a fair price. Let's see if we can make a deal at this price.
